title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XXII, subch. A, pt. 2402 - Procedures For Declaratory Ruling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XXII, subch. A, pt. 2402 - Procedures For Declaratory Ruling

State Regulations
§ 2402.1 - Petition for declaratory ruling

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XXII, subch. A, pt. 2402

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 655[4], 661[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
